content: knitted jumper for men in drops alaska the piece is worked top down with raglan stripes and double neck pattern x-487 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops alaska from garnstudio 600-650-700-750-850-900 g colour 37 dark blue 250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 02 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
